<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataEG extends data { const CODE = 'EG'; const PREFIX = 20; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '[189]\d{8,9}|[24-6]\d{8}|[135]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:15\d|57[23])\d{5,6}|(?:13[23]|(?:2[2-4]|3)\d|4(?:0[2-5]|[578][23]|64)|5(?:0[2-7]|5\d)|6[24-689]3|8(?:2[2-57]|4[26]|6[237]|8[2-4])|9(?:2[27]|3[24]|52|6[2356]|7[2-4]))\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '1[0-25]\d{8}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '900\d{7}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d)(\d{7,8})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{6,7})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
